name: They will pay
description:
DEFAULTCORP forgot to pay  their mercenary and now he is on his way to their HQ...
Destroy turrets and get to the top with the help of AI fused in cyborg mercenary!

Credits:

Sounds - ZapSplat.com

Music:

Defrini - Rockabooly

Gigakoops - Death In General (Nightmare Lyre Remix)

Gigakoops - Fox With a Knife

Gigakoops - Honey Is Sweet, But Nostalgia Is Bitter

Gigakoops - Intro

Gigakoops - My Legendary Silver Triangle Wealth Pyramid
